title: Sex and gender identity
p: These details will be used to help progress your claim.
genderIdentitySame: Is the gender you identify with the same as your sex registered at birth?
otherTitlePreference: If 'other' please enter your preferred title

claimantSex.required: Select an option for the "What is your sex" question

preferredTitle.required: Select a list option from the "What is your preferred title" dropdown

otherTitlePreference.lengthError: Your preferred title must be a minimum of 2 characters
otherTitlePreference.numberError: Tell us your preferred title? This must not include numbers
